title: Drawn by You
description: Drawn By You is a stand alone novella set in Kristen Proby's Fusion Universe.Paige is a waitress at Seduction, the hottest bar in Portland. Even though she adores her job, her real passion is art. She loves to draw and is talented, but getting anyone to take her work seriously has become a never ending nightmare. Will the handsome stranger who offers to be her model open the doors that have so far been closed to her?Tomas is bored. The antiques market is all he knows; it's been his way of life since he took over the family business after his father retired. But a visit to Seduction presents him with an unexpected opportunity.Will the beautiful and talented unknown artist accept his offer and allow him the opportunity for excitement heâ€™s been craving?Paige and Tomas are both searching for something. Will they find it together, or will misunderstandings and doubt get in their way?
author: Anna Edwards
